message.body: I am a proud owner of a Prius C so I can drive us to the park for a hike any time!! Now we just need Spring to happen. ☔️
OMG I'm so psyched! Congrats. I cannot wait to ride in it!
Yeah, pretty exciting stuff! I can venture away from the septa line and live life in the burbs to the fullest! You are welcome to be a passenger anytime. When do you leave for France?
Sorry I was in class earlier, just got out. Those cars are so quiet! What color did you get? We leave the 6th! I haven't even thought about the trip yet!

Oh yeahhhhh, I always forget about your Wednesday marathon teaching. The car is red. I wanted orange but the good deal was on the red one. I'm okay with that. I might have grown tired of orange after 10 years. I definitely want to hear all about your trip when you get back!!
Let's hang out soon! It might be warm enough for a hike when I get back!
